Events that occurred on 9 March.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Roger Verhulst.
1967 - Actor Neil Kaplan is born.
1991 -Translator Nils Werenskiold dies.
2007 - The third "The One Ring Celebration" is held in Burbank, California.
2008 - Tolkien's Shorter Works is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
Darkness begins to flow out of Mordor.
At dusk Frodo, Sam and Gollum reach the Morgul Road.
Gandalf and Pippin reach Minas Tirith. Pippin swears his sword in service to Gondor.
At dusk Pippin and Bergil watch the arrival of the men of the outlands.
Aragorn sets out from Erech and comes to Calembel.
Th√©oden comes to Dunharrow.
Faramir reaches Cair Andros in the evening and spends the night there.
